    • moveRandomly

      public java.util.ArrayList<int[]> moveRandomly​(Level level)
      Move the dustball randomly to a valid position.
      Parameters:
      level - Object which refers to one level/room of the game.
      Returns:
      ArrayList with pairs (row-column) that represent the valid moves that the dustball can do from its current position.

    • validMove

      private boolean validMove​(Level level, int row, int column)
      Indicates if the position (row, column) to move in the board is valid for the dustball.
      Parameters:
      level - Object which refers to one level/room of the game.
      row - Index of the row where the dustball wants to move to.
      column - Index of the column where the dustball wants to move to.
      Returns:
      True if the position is valid, otherwise it returns false.
